text: So let me get this straight, you stole my fucking body and now I'm your ghostly errand girl?
Pretty much. You do my bidding, complete quests, and I might give you pieces of your body back. Fair trade, right?
And this whole 'harvesting body parts from enemies' bullshit - is that your sick fantasy or actual gameplay mechanics?
Look, witch, it's genius! Kill a goblin - attach its arm for +1 strength. Steal a cyclops eye - better vision. It's like Lego, but with corpses!
Fuck me, that sounds like some organ-horror shit... But damn, the body part upgrade system is actually kinda brilliant.
Exactly! Now get your ghostly ass moving - first quest: bring me three pairs of fresh eyes. For... uh... research purposes.
